video.title: The Twilight Zone (Original Series)
video.synopsis: Hosted by creator Rod Serling, this groundbreaking anthology series presents tales of the supernatural that are often tinged with social commentary.

episodes.synopsis: A test pilot suffering from amnesia wanders through a small town desperately searching for people, unaware that the empty town is not what it seems.
episodes.title: Where Is Everybody?

episodes.synopsis: When Death informs salesman Lou that he'll die at midnight, Lou talks Death into a stay of execution to make a final, seemingly perfect sales pitch.
episodes.title: One for the Angels

episodes.synopsis: The town drunk in the old-west faces his past when Fate lends a hand.
episodes.title: Mr. Denton on Doomsday

episodes.synopsis: Faded star Barbara Jean Trenton lives in the past by constantly watching her old films, but her associates hatch a plan to lure her out of isolation.
episodes.title: The Sixteen Millimeter Shrine

episodes.synopsis: When businessman Martin visits his hometown, he discovers he's traveled 25 years into the past and has a disturbing encounter with himself as a boy.
episodes.title: Walking Distance

episodes.synopsis: A hypochondriac man sells his soul to the devil, exchanging it for one million years of immortality.
episodes.title: Escape Clause

episodes.synopsis: A convict, living alone in an asteroid, receives from the police a realistic woman-robot.
episodes.title: The Lonely

episodes.synopsis: Put-upon bookworm Henry Bemis lives to read and rejoices, perhaps prematurely, when a nuclear attack leaves him the sole survivor in a sea of books.
episodes.title: Time Enough at Last

episodes.synopsis: A man with a bad heart fears a recurring nightmare will kill him, and when his dream and reality become indistinguishable, his fate appears sealed.
episodes.title: Perchance to Dream

episodes.synopsis: A man with amnesia inexplicably finds himself on a ship in the Atlantic in 1942, unaware that the ship is about to be attacked by a German submarine.
episodes.title: Judgment Night

episodes.synopsis: Three U.S. astronauts blast into space in an experimental rocket-ship; during the test flight the ship suddenly disappears from radar, then reappears.
episodes.title: And When the Sky Was Opened

episodes.synopsis: When a crook learns that a psychic peddler is selling people items they'll need in the future, he attempts to exploit the gift, with dubious results.
episodes.title: What You Need

episodes.synopsis: A man who can change his face to look like other people uses his ability to improve his life regardless of his affect on others.
episodes.title: The Four of Us Are Dying

episodes.synopsis: With nuclear destruction looming, a pilot and a scientist plot to flee to another planet in a stolen spaceship, but must first handle a rude official.
episodes.title: Third from the Sun

episodes.synopsis: Three astronauts crash-land on what appears to be a barren asteroid. Gradually they turn on one another, until one man makes a shocking discovery.
episodes.title: I Shot an Arrow into the Air

episodes.synopsis: A young woman driving cross-country keeps seeing the same hitchhiker on the roadside and, unaware she has bigger worries, fears he wants to kill her.
episodes.title: The Hitch-Hiker

episodes.synopsis: Franklin Gibbs becomes obsessed with playing a Las Vegas slot machine, losing his life savings, then realizes the machine wants more than his money.
episodes.title: The Fever

episodes.synopsis: A World War I British fighter pilot lands at an American air force base in France 42 years in the future.
episodes.title: The Last Flight

episodes.synopsis: A U.S. army lieutenant serving in the Philippines during WWII develops an uncanny ability to see within his men's faces who will be the next to die.
episodes.title: The Purple Testament

episodes.synopsis: Three astronauts land on an asteroid, where they discover a world of people apparently frozen in time. As they theorize why, one man springs to life.
episodes.title: Elegy

episodes.synopsis: While waiting in a bus station, Millicent Barnes has the strange feeling that her doppelganger is trying to take over her life.
episodes.title: Mirror Image

episodes.synopsis: On a peaceful suburban street, strange occurrences and mysterious people stoke the residents' paranoia to a disastrous intensity.
episodes.title: The Monsters Are Due on Maple Street

episodes.synopsis: The life of businessman Arthur Curtis literally comes unspooled when he learns that he is, in reality, a mentally ill film star named Gerry Reagan.
episodes.title: A World of Difference

episodes.synopsis: A father forbids his daughter from marrying a charismatic history professor when he discovers the man is an immortal who has lived for many centuries.
episodes.title: Long Live Walter Jameson

episodes.synopsis: A crash landing on Mars leaves fretful scientist Sam Conrad as the lone survivor of an expedition.
episodes.title: People Are Alike All Over

episodes.synopsis: In 1880, as outlaw Joe is about to be hanged, he's teleported to the future by a scientist, who gets a rude surprise when he tries to send Joe back.
episodes.title: Execution

episodes.synopsis: Boxer Bolie refuses to believe a young boy's wish has magically saved him from defeat and later suffers the consequences of his selfish skepticism.
episodes.title: The Big Tall Wish

episodes.synopsis: After a cop-killer dies in a shootout, he lands in a world where his every wish is granted. The fantasy, however, soon becomes more hell than heaven.
episodes.title: A Nice Place to Visit

episodes.synopsis: When an oddly familiar girl turns up outside Helen Foley's door, she realizes she must face a horrific memory about her mother's long-unsolved murder.
episodes.title: Nightmare as a Child

episodes.synopsis: While napping on the train home, a harried adman dreams of Willoughby, a utopian 1880 town, then gets a chance to make Willoughby his final last stop.
episodes.title: A Stop at Willoughby

episodes.synopsis: A young man obsessed with winning over an uninterested beauty gets more than he bargained for when he buys a love potion to gain her affection.
episodes.title: The Chaser

episodes.synopsis: A suicidal trumpet player finds himself in a bizarre world in which he seems to be the only moving being, except for one helpful other musician.
episodes.title: A Passage for Trumpet

episodes.synopsis: An eccentric loser gets a new life from his guardian angel, but there is a price to keeping it.
episodes.title: Mr. Bevis

episodes.synopsis: As Marsha White tries to return a gift to a department store's ninth floor, she's shocked to find there is no ninth floor and nothing is as it seems.
episodes.title: The After Hours

episodes.synopsis: A down-and-out baseball team's fortunes are lifted by a mysterious but seemingly unbeatable young player.
episodes.title: The Mighty Casey

episodes.synopsis: A writer demonstrates he can control reality simply by dictating changes.
episodes.title: A World of His Own

episodes.synopsis: A pilot of a downed WW II bomber comes to in the African desert and desperately tries to find out what happened to the rest of his crew.
episodes.title: King Nine Will Not Return

episodes.synopsis: A couple's luck turns when a genie springs from a bottle in their antique shop. He grants them four wishes but warns, "be careful what they wish for."
episodes.title: The Man in the Bottle

episodes.synopsis: Small time criminal Jackie Rhoades must face both his past and his conscience while waiting for his next assignment.
episodes.title: Nervous Man in a Four Dollar Room

episodes.synopsis: Bartlett Finchley's paranoia about the machines around proves true.
episodes.title: A Thing About Machines

episodes.synopsis: Seeking refuge from a storm, traveler David Ellington comes upon a bizarre hermitage of monks, who have imprisoned a man who begs for his help.
episodes.title: The Howling Man

episodes.synopsis: With her head wrapped in bandages, a hospitalized young woman awaits the outcome of a State-mandated surgical procedure to make her face look normal.
episodes.title: Eye of the Beholder

episodes.synopsis: A pair of newlyweds stopping in a small town are trapped by their own superstition when playing a fortune telling machine in a local diner.
episodes.title: Nick of Time

episodes.synopsis: The daughter of an inventor objects to their "perfect" home where they are waited on by mechanical servants.
episodes.title: The Lateness of the Hour

episodes.synopsis: A nostalgic actor revisits his late wife and friends at their old haunt, only to find that he is now out of place there.
episodes.title: The Trouble with Templeton

episodes.synopsis: When three dum-dum crooks get ahold of a camera that takes pictures of the future, they set out to make a quick fortune with their new toy.
episodes.title: A Most Unusual Camera

episodes.synopsis: When a Santa Claus who's been fired on Christmas Eve finds a strange bag that gives out presents, he wants to help the less fortunate enjoy Christmas.
episodes.title: Night of the Meek

episodes.synopsis: In a tragic, western town, a desperate father begs for clemency as his son is slated to die for an accident he could not have prevented.
episodes.title: Dust

episodes.synopsis: After debating whether time travel can change history, a prominent Washington man finds himself in 1865, on the night President Lincoln will be shot.
episodes.title: Back There

episodes.synopsis: A used car salesman buys a car that dooms him to tell only the truth.
episodes.title: The Whole Truth

episodes.synopsis: When a woman investigates a clamor on the roof of her rural house, she discovers a small UFO and little aliens emerging from it. Or so it seems.
episodes.title: The Invaders

episodes.synopsis: Gaining telepathic abilities when his coin lands on its edge, bank clerk Hector B. Poole learns the difference between people's plans and fantasies.
episodes.title: A Penny for Your Thoughts

episodes.synopsis: While in the hospital recovering from overwork, Liz Powell keeps dreaming about going down to the hospital morgue.
episodes.title: Twenty-Two

episodes.synopsis: Passing through the sound barrier a commercial airliner inadvertently travels back in time.
episodes.title: Odyssey of Flight 33

episodes.synopsis: A timid vacuum-cleaner salesman is given the strength of 300 men by some experimenting aliens.
episodes.title: Mr. Dingle, the Strong

episodes.synopsis: An old radio transports embittered bachelor Ed Lindsay back to a seemingly happier time when it starts broadcasting programs from the 1930s and 1940s.
episodes.title: Static

episodes.synopsis: A compulsive gambler cajoles his friend to use his telekinesis to affect the results of the gambling tables in Las Vegas.
episodes.title: The Prime Mover

episodes.synopsis: A toy telephone becomes the link between a young boy and his dead grandmother.
episodes.title: Long Distance Call

episodes.synopsis: A pioneer from a wagon train in 1847 sets off to find something for his ill son and stumbles into present day New Mexico.
episodes.title: A Hundred Yards over the Rim

episodes.synopsis: After a successful gold heist, the criminals and a scientist cohort put themselves in suspended animation. Decades later, they have a rude awakening.
episodes.title: The Rip Van Winkle Caper

episodes.synopsis: Annoyed by a club member's constant chatter, a man bets him he cannot remain silent for a year, living in a glass enclosure in the club basement.
episodes.title: The Silence

episodes.synopsis: Adam Grant is trapped in a recurring nightmare, in which he is sentenced to death and executed.
episodes.title: Shadow Play

episodes.synopsis: Using the power of mind over matter, Archibald Beechcroft remakes the world to his own specifications.
episodes.title: The Mind and the Matter

episodes.synopsis: After a frantic phone call about a crashed spaceship, two policeman try to determine which bus passenger at a snowed-in roadside diner is not human.
episodes.title: Will the Real Martian Please Stand Up

episodes.synopsis: In a future totalitarian society, a librarian is declared obsolete and sentenced to death.
episodes.title: The Obsolete Man

episodes.synopsis: Two survivors of an apocalyptic battle, a man and a woman from each opposing sides, approach each other suspiciously.
episodes.title: Two

episodes.synopsis: Federal aviation investigator Grant Sheckly must deal with a mystery when a plane lands at an airport without pilots, passengers or luggage.
episodes.title: The Arrival

episodes.synopsis: As a neighborhood scrambles to prepare for an impending nuclear attack, everyone turns against the one family that installed a bomb shelter.
episodes.title: The Shelter

episodes.synopsis: Near the end of the Civil War, a sergeant stops at the remains of the home of Lavinia Godwin, who's been watching wounded soldiers parade by.
episodes.title: The Passersby

episodes.synopsis: A frustrated pool champ has beaten everyone -- except for the deceased legend Fats Brown. And guess who just walked in to the pool hall.
episodes.title: A Game of Pool

episodes.synopsis: A South American revolutionary comes into the possession of a mirror that shows him his potential assassins.
episodes.title: The Mirror

episodes.synopsis: An Old West lawman visits the grave of a man he failed to track down to prove he was never afraid of him, but gets more than he bargained for.
episodes.title: The Grave

episodes.synopsis: A young boy possessing vast mental powers but lacking emotional development holds his terrified family in thrall to his every juvenile wish.
episodes.title: It's a Good Life

episodes.synopsis: A former German SS captain returns to the concentration camp he once enjoyed ruling -- and finds himself on trial by those who died at his hands.
episodes.title: Death's-Head Revisited

episodes.synopsis: When the Earth falls out of orbit, two women try to cope with increasingly oppressive heat in a nearly abandoned city.
episodes.title: The Midnight Sun

episodes.synopsis: In the last days of the Civil War, Confederate soldiers come across a witch who can help bring victory to the Southern cause.
episodes.title: Still Valley

episodes.synopsis: A businessman who has recently returned from Africa is stalked by the superstitions and warnings of a witch doctor.
episodes.title: The Jungle

episodes.synopsis: Janitor Woodrow Mulligan gets a trip from 1890 to 1962 courtesy of his employer's time helmet.
episodes.title: Once Upon a Time

episodes.synopsis: An army major awakens in a room with four other people, and they each begin to question how they arrived there -- and, more important, how to escape.
episodes.title: Five Characters in Search of an Exit

episodes.synopsis: Hot shot new Lieutenant Katell tries to make his mark on the last day of World War II in the Pacific and gets a unique perspective on his actions.
episodes.title: A Quality of Mercy

episodes.synopsis: An old woman has fought death a thousand times and always won. But now she's afraid to let a wounded policeman in her door for fear he is Mr. Death.
episodes.title: Nothing in the Dark

episodes.synopsis: Wealthy Paul Radin tries to get three people from his past to apologize to him by offering them shelter from a staged and phony nuclear war scenario.
episodes.title: One More Pallbearer

episodes.synopsis: A homeless man takes the shoes of a dead gangster and steps into his life.
episodes.title: Dead Man's Shoes

episodes.synopsis: Upon returning from a coon hunt, Hyder Simpson discovers that no one can see or hear him because he has passed on.
episodes.title: The Hunt

episodes.synopsis: The star of a Western TV series suddenly finds himself transported back in time to the real Wild West, and face-to-face with the real Jesse James.
episodes.title: Showdown with Rance McGrew

episodes.synopsis: An old man living in a rest home thinks he's found the secret of youth in children's games.
episodes.title: Kick the Can

episodes.synopsis: Sadistic and hated theater critic Fitzgerald Fortune buys a player piano that has the power to reveal the souls of all who hear it.
episodes.title: A Piano in the House

episodes.synopsis: A young man wakes up at his own funeral and wants to know what's going on. The townsfolk begin to wonder whether he's a man or something else.
episodes.title: The Last Rites of Jeff Myrtlebank

episodes.synopsis: An alien race comes to earth, promising peace and sharing technology. A linguist and his team set out to translate the aliens' language.
episodes.title: To Serve Man

episodes.synopsis: Jenny wears a brace on her leg. Her friend, an elderly man named Old Ben, brightens her life by performing magic: He can turn into anything he wants.
episodes.title: The Fugitive

episodes.synopsis: Awoken by the cries of his daughter, a father enters the girl's room to find she's vanished -- even though he can still hear her crying out for help.
episodes.title: Little Girl Lost

episodes.synopsis: David Gurney wakes up to another ordinary day. Except today, nobody knows who he is.
episodes.title: Person or Persons Unknown

episodes.synopsis: On a desolate planet, two astronauts discover a society populated by beings only 1/100th their size. One astronaut decides to rule the society as God.
episodes.title: The Little People

episodes.synopsis: An obsessed man wants to expose evil in the world, investigating people he sees as murderers and communists and then attempting to ruin their lives.
episodes.title: Four O'Clock

episodes.synopsis: A gas station attendant given to telling tall tales about himself is kidnapped by aliens who believe him to be one of Earth's leading intellects.
episodes.title: Hocus-Pocus and Frisby

episodes.synopsis: An elderly couple shop for younger replacement bodies, then resort to desperate measures to cover the cost.
episodes.title: The Trade-Ins

episodes.synopsis: A man from the stars comes with a gift to a small Mexican village whose residents do not welcome this stranger.
episodes.title: The Gift

episodes.synopsis: Ventriloquist Jerry Etherson is convinced that his dummy, Willie, is alive and evil -- a theory he tests when he makes up a new act with a new dummy.
episodes.title: The Dummy

episodes.synopsis: Newlywed Alex Walker finds himself being pulled back to his childhood and back to his widowed mother in the house where he grew up.
episodes.title: Young Man's Fancy

episodes.synopsis: A recent widower orders a cybernetic "grandmother" for his children. One of his daughters fiercely rejects her, with near tragic consequences.
episodes.title: I Sing the Body Electric

episodes.synopsis: Inept guardian angel Harmon Cavender is given a chance to earn his wings by helping an unconventional big city woman, the young, awkward Agnes Grep.
episodes.title: Cavender Is Coming

episodes.synopsis: After being forced to retire, Professor Fowler contemplates suicide when he doesn't feel he's made a difference in the world.
episodes.title: The Changing of the Guard

episodes.synopsis: Small-time bookie Max Phillips hates his life. He sets out to make amends to his son, Pip, who's been mortally wounded in combat in Vietnam.
episodes.title: In Praise of Pip

episodes.synopsis: In the future, boxing is performed by mechanical robots. A manager faced with a broken client decides to enter the ring himself and replace him.
episodes.title: Steel

episodes.synopsis: A man, newly recovered from a nervous breakdown, becomes convinced that a monster only he sees is damaging the plane he's flying in.
episodes.title: Nightmare at 20,000 Feet

episodes.synopsis: A man is given a stopwatch that halts time.
episodes.title: A Kind of Stop Watch

episodes.synopsis: A washed-up jockey gets his wish while waiting for the results of his race fixing hearing.
episodes.title: The Last Night of a Jockey

episodes.synopsis: A father does battle with his stepdaughter's talking doll, whose vocabulary includes such phrases as "I hate you" and "I'm going to kill you."
episodes.title: Living Doll

episodes.synopsis: In a post-apocalyptic settlement, the inhabitants' survival is dependent on the advice of an unseen man living in a nearby cave.
episodes.title: The Old Man in the Cave

episodes.synopsis: Caregiver Barbara Polk must take care of her uncle's robot after his untimely and accidental death.
episodes.title: Uncle Simon

episodes.synopsis: Colonel Cook stranded on another planet with no hope for rescue meets a woman who is the sole survivor from another planet.
episodes.title: Probe 7-Over and Out

episodes.synopsis: Three 1960s National Guard soldiers on maneuvers near the Little Big Horn battle site find themselves unwittingly involved in Custer's last stand.
episodes.title: The 7th Is Made Up of Phantoms

episodes.synopsis: Aging marriage man convinces his brother to inject him with a youth serum.
episodes.title: A Short Drink from a Certain Fountain

episodes.synopsis: An old man believes that his life will end the moment his grandfather clock stops ticking.
episodes.title: Ninety Years Without Slumbering

episodes.synopsis: Movie star Bunny Blake receives a ring from her hometown which is giving her warnings to come home while she flies cross country.
episodes.title: Ring-a-Ding Girl

episodes.synopsis: After involved with a hit-and-run killing a child, Mr. Oliver Pope is haunted by his car.
episodes.title: You Drive

episodes.synopsis: Before leaving on a decades long mission, astronaut Douglas Stansfield meets a woman and falls in love.
episodes.title: The Long Morrow

episodes.synopsis: Saladore Ross has a unique talent where he can trade physical characteristics with other people and will do anything to get the love of Leah Maitland.
episodes.title: The Self-Improvement of Salvadore Ross

episodes.synopsis: In a future society, everyone must undergo an operation at age 19 to become beautiful. One young woman desperately wants to hold onto her identity.
episodes.title: Number Twelve Looks Just Like You

episodes.synopsis: Three leather jacket wearing, motorcycle riding men invade a peaceful neighborhood.
episodes.title: Black Leather Jackets

episodes.synopsis: Telephone calls begin to haunt a disabled elderly woman.
episodes.title: Night Call

episodes.synopsis: A computer technician begins to take advice for his love life from Agnes, the computer he works with.
episodes.title: From Agnes with Love

episodes.synopsis: An engaged heiress is terrorized by a middle-aged woman on a horse pleading with her not to go through with her impending marriage.
episodes.title: Spur of the Moment

episodes.synopsis: It is the end of the Civil War and Union troops have occupied the South. They are going to execute a Southern resistance fighter.
episodes.title: An Occurrence at Owl Creek Bridge

episodes.synopsis: A reporter interviews a Hollywood movie queen who has a secret to her eternal beauty.
episodes.title: Queen of the Nile

episodes.synopsis: Philanderer Joe Britt sees his indiscretions shown on his own TV set after it was worked on by a very unique repairman.
episodes.title: What's in the Box?

episodes.synopsis: Wealthy Jason Foster invites his greedy heirs to a party where they must wear the masks he made for them or else be cut off from their inheritance.
episodes.title: The Masks

episodes.synopsis: The sun won't rise on a small town where an execution is scheduled to take place.
episodes.title: I Am the Night, Color Me Black

episodes.synopsis: Roswell Flemington enjoys loud noises, is an annoyance to others and is suitably punished.
episodes.title: Sounds and Silences

episodes.synopsis: When ventriloquist Jonathan West can not find any work his dummy Caesar suggests he turn to robbery.
episodes.title: Caesar and Me

episodes.synopsis: A defector is trapped in a hotel room and given 3 hours to find a hidden bomb.
episodes.title: The Jeopardy Room

episodes.synopsis: Young New York married couple Bob and Millie Frazier leave a party after drinking too much.
episodes.title: Stopover in a Quiet Town

episodes.synopsis: A conversation between a WWII vet and a Japanese gardener in the vet's attic reaches a violent climax after discussing their experiences in the war.
episodes.title: The Encounter

episodes.synopsis: Mr. Garrity comes into town offering to resurrect the dead and reunite the townsfolk with their departed loved ones out of the goodness of his heart.
episodes.title: Mr. Garrity and the Graves

episodes.synopsis: A heartless CEO completely automates his factory and lays off almost all of his workers over the objections of his employees.
episodes.title: The Brain Center at Whipple's

episodes.synopsis: Singer Floyd Burney searches the backwoods for new songs and finds Mary Rachel and much more deep in the Twilight Zone.
episodes.title: Come Wander with Us

episodes.synopsis: Charlotte Scott and policeman Robert Franklin seem to be stalked by giants.
episodes.title: The Fear

episodes.synopsis: Two children escape their bickering parents through a portal in the bottom of their swimming pool to a magical land watched over by an old woman.
episodes.title: The Bewitchin' Pool
